actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The aboleth makes two Tentacle attacks and uses either Consume Memories or Dominate Mind if available.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 15 ft., Hit: 12 (2d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of four tentacles.

actions.name: Consume Memories
actions.desc: Intelligence Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature within 30 feet that is Charmed or Grappled by the aboleth. Failure: 10 (3d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Dominate Mind (2/Day)
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the aboleth can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the aboleth dies or is on a different plane of existence from the target. While Charmed, the target acts as an ally to the aboleth and is under its control while within 30 feet of it. In addition, the aboleth and the target can communicate telepathically with each other over any distance. The target repeats the save whenever it takes damage as well as after every 24 hours it spends at least 1 mile away from the aboleth, ending the effect on itself on a success.

If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the rug can give it the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) instead of dealing damage. Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, is suffocating, and takes 10 (2d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage at the start of each of its turns. The rug can smother only one creature at a time. While grappling the target, the rug can't take this action, the rug halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage.

actions.desc: The centaur moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and can move through the spaces of Medium or smaller creatures. Each creature whose space the centaur enters is targeted under once by the following effect: Strength Saving Throw: DC 14. Failure: 7 (1d6 + 4) bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chimera makes one Ram attack, one Bite attack, and one Claw attack. It can replace the Claw attack with a use of Fire Breath if available.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage or 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage if the chimera had Advantage on the attack roll.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Ram
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 31 (7d8) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The chuul makes two Pincer attacks and uses Paralyzing Tentacles.

actions.name: Pincer
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of two pincers.

actions.name: Paralyzing Tentacles
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature Grappled by the chuul. Failure: The target has the Poisoned condition and repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. While Poisoned, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Bludgeoning damage plus 6 (1d12) Acid damage, and the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Acid damage taken.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The cloaker makes one Attack and two Tail attacks.

actions.name: Attack
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the cloaker attaches to it. While the cloaker is attached, the target has the Blinded condition, and the cloaker can make Attack attacks against other targets. In addition, the cloaker halves the damage it takes (round down), and the target takes the same amount of damage. The cloaker can detach itself by spending 5 feet of movement. The target or a creature within 5 feet of it can take an action to try to detach the cloaker, doing so by succeeding on a DC 14 Strength (Athletics) check.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The giant makes two attacks, using Thunderous Mace or Thundercloud in any combination. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Fog Cloud.

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach 10 ft. Hit: 21 (3d8 + 8) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Thunder damage.

actions.name: Thundercloud
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +12, range 240 ft. Hit: 18 (3d6 + 8) Thunder damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The giant casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 15): At Will: Detect Magic, Fog Cloud, Light. 1/Day Each: Control Weather, Gaseous Form, Telekinesis.

actions.name: Petrifiying Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is subjected to the following effect: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 11. First failure: The target has the Restrained condition, and repeats the save at the end of its next turn if it is still Restrained, ending the effect on itself on a success. Second Failure: The target has the Petrified condition, instead of the Restrained condition, for 24 hours.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft., Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 40-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 40 (9d8) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: The target can’t take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an Action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Slowing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Mind Spike (level 4 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 10 ft., Hit: 17 (2d10 + 6) Slashing damage plus 4 (1d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 60-foot-long, 5-foot-wide Line. Failure: 54 (12d8) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 18, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: The target can’t take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an Action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At Will: Detect Magic, Mind Spike (level 4 version), Minor Illusion, Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell). 1/Day Each: Greater Restoration, Major Image.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Slowing Breath or (B) Spellcasting to cast Mind Spike (level 5 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +15, reach 15 ft., Hit: 19 (2d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Acid damage.

actions.name: Acid Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot-long, 10-foot-wide Line. Failure: 63 (14d8) Acid damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Slowing Breath
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 22, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. Failure: The target can’t take Reactions; its Speed is halved; and it can take either an Action or a Bonus Action on its turn, not both. This effect lasts until the end of its next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 21): At Will: Detect Magic, Mind Spike (level 5 version), Minor Illusion, Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell). 1/Day Each: Greater Restoration, Major Image, Project Image.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft., Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the couatl’s next turn.

actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 15, one Medium or smaller creature the couatl can see within 5 feet. Failure: 8 (1d6 + 5) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Crush
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft., Hit: 6 (1d8 + 2) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13). Until the grapple ends, the darkmantle can’t use Crush on another target.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The darkmantle creates a 15-foot radius sphere of magical darkness centered on itself. The darkness spreads around corners. A creature with darkvision can’t see through this darkness, and nonmagical light can’t illuminate it. The darkness lasts until the darkmantle uses this action again or dies.

actions.name: Crush
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft., Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage, and the darkmantle attaches to the target. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature and the darkmantle had advantage on the attack roll, it covers the target, which is now Blinded, Muffled, and is suffocating while the darkmantle is attached in this way. While attached to a target, the darkmantle can attack only the target but has Advantage on its attack rolls. Its Speed becomes 0, it can't benefit from any bonus to its Speed, and it moves with the target. A creature can take an action to try to detach the darkmantle from itself, doing so with a successful DC 13 Strength (Athletics) check. On its turn, the darkmantle can detach itself by using 5 feet of movement.

actions.name: Darkness Aura (1/Day)
actions.desc: Magical Darkness fills a 15-foot Emanation originating from the darkmantle. This effect lasts while the darkmantle maintains Concentration on it, up to 10 minutes. Darkvision can't penetrate this area, and no light can illuminate it.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Multiattack

The whirlwind lasts until the djinni's Concentration on it ends. The djinni can move the whirlwind up to 20 feet at the start of each of its turns. Whenever the whirlwind enters a creature's space or a creature enters the whirlwind, that creature is subjected to the following effect: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17 (a creature makes this save only once per turn, and the djinni is unaffected). Failure: While in the whirlwind, the target has the Restrained condition and moves with the whirlwind. At the start of each of its turns, the Restrained target takes 21 (6d6) Thunder damage. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.desc: The djinni casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Detect Magic 2/Day Each: Create Food and Water, Create Water (instead of water, tongues, Wind Walk 1/Day Each: Creation, Gaseous Form, Invisibility, Major Image, Plane Shift

actions.name: Verdant Wisp
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 90 ft., Hit: 10 (3d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Engulf
actions.desc: The cube moves up to its Speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks. The cube can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures if it has room inside itself to contain them (see the Ooze Cube trait). Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 12, each creature whose space the cube enters for the first time during this move. Failure: 10 (3d6) Acid damage, and the target is engulfed. An engulfed target is suffocating, can't cast spells with a Verbal component, has the Restrained condition, and takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the cube's turns. When the cube moves, the engulfed target moves with it. An engulfed target can try to escape by taking an action to make a DC 12 Strength (Athletics) check. On a successful check, the target escapes and enters the nearest unoccupied space. Success: Half damage, and the target moves to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cube. If there is no unoccupied space, the target fails the save instead.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Necrotic damage.

Failure or Success: The kraken can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lamia makes two Claw attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Corrupting Touch.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack: +5, reach 5 ft., Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Corrupting Touch
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 13, one creature the lamia can see within 5 feet. Failure: 13 (3d8) Psychic damage, and the target is cursed for 1 hour. Until the curse ends, the target has the Charmed and Poisoned conditions.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The lamia casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13):
At Will: Disguise Self (can appear as a Large or Medium shaped, Minor Illusion)
1/Day Each: Geas, Major Image, Scrying

actions.name: Leap (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The lamia jumps up to 30 feet by spending 10 feet of movement.

actions.name: Vile Slime
actions.desc: Melee Attack: +2, reach 5 ft., Hit: 2 (1d4) Poison damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The lich makes three attacks, using Eldritch Burst or Paralyzing Touch in any combination.

actions.name: Eldritch Burst
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack: +12, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., Hit: 31 (4d12 + 5) Force damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.desc: Melee Attack: +12, reach 5 ft., Hit: 15 (3d6 + 5) Cold damage, and the target has the Paralyzed condition until the start of the lich's next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The lich casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20):
At Will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Dispel Magic, Fly, Invisibility, Lightning Bolt (level 5 version), Magic Bolt (level 5 version), Mage Hand, Prestidigitation
2/Day Each: Animate Dead, Dimension Door, Plane Shift
1/Day Each: Chain Lightning, Finger of Death, Power Word Kill, Scrying

actions.name: Protective Magic (Reaction)
actions.desc: The lich casts Counterspell or Shield in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Legendary Action: Use
actions.desc: The lich can expend a use of its Legendary Action feature (4/day, regain at start of turn) to take one of the following actions.

actions.name: Teleport (Legendary Action)
actions.desc: The lich teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and each creature within 10 feet of the space it left takes 11 (2d10) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Disrupt Life (Legendary Action)
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20, each creature that isn't an Undead in a 20-foot Emanation originating from the lich. Failure: 22 (4d10) Necrotic damage. Success: Half damage. Failure or Success: The lich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Legendary Action)
actions.desc: The lich casts Fear, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The lich can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mage makes three Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack: +6, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., Hit: 16 (3d8 + 3) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The mage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14):
At Will: Detect Magic, Light, Mage Armor (included in AC), Magic Bolt, Prestidigitation
2/Day Each: Fireball (level 4 version), Invisibility
1/Day Each: Cone of Cold, Fly.

actions.name: Misty Step (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The mage casts Misty Step, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Protective Magic (Reaction)
actions.desc: The mage casts Counterspell or Shield in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The archmage makes four Arcane Burst attacks.

actions.name: Arcane Burst
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack: +9, reach 5 ft. or range 150 ft., Hit: 27 (4d10 + 5) Force damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The archmage casts one of the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17):
At Will: Detect Magic, Detect Thoughts, Disguise Self, Invisibility, Light, Mage Armor (included in AC), Magic Bolt, Prestidigitation
2/Day Each: Fly, Lightning Bolt (level 7 version)
1/Day Each: Cone of Cold (level 9 version), Mind Blank (cast before combat), Scrying, Teleport

actions.name: Misty Step (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The archmage casts Misty Step, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Protective Magic (Reaction)
actions.desc: The archmage casts Counterspell or Shield in response to the spell's trigger, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Touch
actions.desc: Melee Attack: +4, reach 5 ft., Hit: 7 (2d4 + 2) Fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it starts burning.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The manticore makes three attacks, using Rend or Tail Spike in any combination.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail Spike
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 100/200 ft. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The marilith makes six Pact Blade attacks and uses Constrict.

actions.name: Pact Blade
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 17, one Medium or smaller creature the marilith can see within 5 feet. Failure: 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage. The target has the grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Teleport (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: The marilith teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The medusa makes two Claw attacks and one Snake Hair attack, or it makes three Poison Ray attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Snake Hair
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Poison Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 150 ft. Hit: 11 (2d8 + 2) Poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Fog Cloud (1/Day)
actions.desc: The mephit casts Fog Cloud, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Frost Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 7 (3d4) Cold damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 3 (1d4 + 1) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 11, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2 (1d4) Slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Steam Breath (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 10, each creature in a 15-foot Cone. Failure: 5 (2d4) Fire damage, and the target’s speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of the mephit’s next turn. Success: Half damage only. Failure or Success: Being underwater doesn’t grant Resistance to this Fire damage.

actions.name: Ocean Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +2, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 3 (1d6) Piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) Cold damage. If the target is a creature, its Speed decreases by 10 feet until the end of its next turn. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the merfolk’s hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The merrow makes two attacks, using Bite, Claw, or Harpoon in any combination.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the end of the merrow’s next turn.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Harpoon
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the merrow pulls the target up to 15 feet straight toward itself.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mummy makes two Rotting Fist attacks and uses Dreadful Glare.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft., Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, one creature the mummy can see within 60 feet. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition until the end of the mummy's next turn. Success: The target is immune to this mummy's Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

traits.name: Immunities
traits.desc: Necrotic, Poison; Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Paralyzed, Poisoned

actions.name: Abyssal Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft., Hit: 10 (1d10 + 4) slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Gore (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft., Hit: 18 (4d6 + 4) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature and the minotaur moved 10+ feet straight toward it immediately before the hit, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) Piercing damage and has the Prone condition.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The mummy makes one Rotting Fist or Channel Negative Energy attack, and it uses Dreadful Glare.

actions.name: Rotting Fist
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +9, reach 5 ft., Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, it is cursed. While cursed, the target can't regain Hit Points, it gains no benefit from finishing a Long Rest, and its Hit Point maximum decreases by 10 (3d6) every 24 hours that elapse. A creature dies and turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack.

actions.name: Channel Negative Energy
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +9, range 60 ft., Hit: 25 (6d6 + 4) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Dreadful Glare
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the mummy can see within 60 feet. Failure: 25 (5d6 + 7) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the end of the mummy's next turn. Success: The target is immune to this mummy's Dreadful Glare for 24 hours.

traits.name: Immunities
traits.desc: Necrotic, Poison; Charmed, Exhaustion, Frightened, Paralyzed, Poisoned

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
traits.desc: If the mummy fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The mummy has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Undead Restoration
traits.desc: If destroyed, the mummy gains a new body in 24 hours if its heart is intact, reviving with all its Hit Points. The new body appears in an unoccupied space within the mummy's lair. The heart is a Tiny object that has AC 17, HP 10, and immunity to all damage except Force.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The mummy casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 17, +9 to hit with spell attacks). At Will: Dispel Magic, Thaumaturgy. 1/Day each: Animate Dead, Harm, Insect Plague (level 7 version).

reactions.name: Whirlwind of Sand
reactions.desc: Trigger: The mummy is hit by an attack roll. Response: The mummy takes 2 to the AC against the attack, possibly causing the attack to miss, and the mummy teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. Each creature of its choice that it can see within 5 feet of its destination space has the Blinded condition until the end of the mummy's next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Dread Command
legendary_actions.desc: The mummy casts Command (level 2 version), using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. The mummy can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Glare
legendary_actions.desc: The mummy uses Dreadful Glare. The mummy can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

legendary_actions.name: Necrotic Strike
legendary_actions.desc: The mummy makes one Rotting Fist or Channel Negative Energy attack.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The nalfeshnee makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft., Hit: 16 (2d10 + 5) Slashing damage plus 11 (2d10) Force damage.

actions.name: Teleport
actions.desc: The nalfeshnee teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The nalfeshnee has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Demonic Restoration
traits.desc: If the nalfeshnee dies outside the Abyss, its body dissolves into ichor, and it gains a new body instantly, reviving with all its Hit Points somewhere in the Abyss.

bonus_actions.name: Horror Nimbus (Recharge 5-6)
bonus_actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 15, each creature in a 15-foot Emanation originating from the nalfeshnee. Failure: 20 (4d8) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition for 1 minute, until it takes damage, or until it ends its turn with the nalfeshnee out of line of sight. Success: The target takes half damage and is not Frightened.

reactions.name: Pursuit
reactions.desc: Trigger: Another creature the nalfeshnee can see ends its move within 120 feet of the nalfeshnee. Response: The nalfeshnee uses Teleport, but its destination space must be within 10 feet of the triggering creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hag makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft., Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Haunting (1/Day; Requires Soul Bag)
actions.desc: While on the Ethereal Plane, the hag casts Dream, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting. Only the hag can serve as the spell's messenger, and the target must be a creature the hag can see on the Material Plane. The spell fails and is wasted if the target is under the effect of the Protection from Evil and Good spell or within a Magic Circle spell. If the target takes damage from the Dream spell, the target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to that damage. If the spell kills the target, its soul is trapped in the hag's soul bag, and the target can't be raised from the dead until its soul is released.

traits.name: Coven Magic
traits.desc: While within 30 feet of at least two hag allies, the hag can cast one of the following spells, requiring no Material components, using the spell's normal casting time, and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): 3/day: Scry, Find Familiar, Identify, Locate Object, Scrying (or Unseen Servant, if the hag must finish a Long Rest before using this trait to cast that spell again).

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The hag has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Soul Bag
traits.desc: The hag has a soul bag. While holding or carrying the bag, the hag can use its Nightmare Haunting action. The bag has AC 15, HP 20, and Resistance to all damage. The bag turns to dust if reduced to 0 Hit Points. If the bag is destroyed, any souls held in it holding are released. The hag can create a new bag after 7 days.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The hag casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 14): At Will: Detect Magic, Etherealness, Magic Missile (level 4 version). 2/Day each: Phantasmal Killer, Plane Shift (self only).

bonus_actions.name: Shape-Shift
bonus_actions.desc: The hag shape-shifts into a Small or Medium Humanoid, or it returns to its true form. Other than its size, its game statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft., Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Ethereal Stride
actions.desc: The nightmare and up to three willing creatures within 5 feet of it teleport to the Ethereal Plane from the Material Plane or vice versa.

traits.name: Languages
traits.desc: Understands Abyssal, Common, and Infernal but can't speak

traits.name: Fire Resistance
traits.desc: The nightmare can grant Resistance to Fire damage to a rider while it is on the nightmare.

traits.name: Illumination
traits.desc: The nightmare sheds Bright light in a 10-foot radius and Dim Light for an additional 10 feet.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Parry (Reaction)
actions.desc: Trigger: The noble is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The noble adds 2 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss.

actions.name: Pseudopod
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (3d6 + 2) Acid damage.

actions.name: Greatclub
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Javelin
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The oni makes two Claw or Nightmare Ray attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 10 ft. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) Slashing damage plus 9 (2d8) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Nightmare Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 60 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 2) Psychic damage, and the target has the Frightened condition until the start of the oni's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The otyugh makes one Bite attack and two Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition. Whenever the poisoned target finishes a Long Rest, it is subjected to the following effect: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 15, failure: The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by 5 (1d10) and doesn't return to normal until the Poisoned condition ends on the target. Success: The Poisoned condition ends.

actions.name: Tentacle
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 10 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two tentacles.

actions.name: Tentacle Slam
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, each creature Grappled by the otyugh, failure: 16 (3d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage, and the target has the Stunned condition until the start of the otyugh's next turn. Success: Half damage only.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The owlbear makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (2d8 + 5) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) Piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) Poison damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 Hit Points, the target becomes stable, and it has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While Poisoned, the target also has the Paralyzed condition.

actions.name: Ethereal Jaunt (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The spider teleports from the Material Plane to the Ethereal Plane or vice versa.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The pirate makes two Dagger attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Enthralling Panache.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Enthralling Panache (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pirate can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The pirate makes three attacks, using Rapier or Pistol in any combination.

actions.name: Rapier
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage, and the pirate has Advantage on the next attack roll it makes before the end of this turn.

actions.name: Pistol
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +7, range 30/90 ft. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Captain's Charm (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature the pirate can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has the Charmed condition until the start of the pirate's next turn.

actions.name: Riposte (Reaction)
actions.desc: Trigger: The pirate is hit by a melee attack roll while holding a weapon. Response: The pirate adds 3 to its AC against that attack, possibly causing it to miss. On a miss, the pirate makes one Rapier attack against the triggering creature if within range.

actions.name: Divine Awareness (Trait)
actions.desc: The planetar knows if it hears a lie.

actions.name: Evasion Restoration (Trait)
actions.desc: If the planetar dies outside Mount Celestial, its body disappears, and it gains a new body instantly, arriving with all its Hit Points somewhere in Mount Celestia.

actions.name: Magic Resistance (Trait)
actions.desc: The planetar has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The planetar makes three Radiant Sword attacks or uses Holy Burst twice.

actions.name: Radiant Sword
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach 10 ft., Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) Slashing damage plus 18 (4d8) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Holy Burst
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 20, each enemy in a 20-foot-radius Sphere centered on a point the planetar can see within 120 feet, Failure: 24 (7d6) Radiant damage, Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The planetar casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, 1/Day Each: Commune, Control Weather, Dispel Evil and Good, Raise Dead.

actions.name: Divine Aid (Bonus Action, 2/Day)
actions.desc: The planetar casts Cure Wounds, Invisibility, Lesser Restoration, or Remove Curse, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft., Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 60 ft., Hit: 5 (2d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 12): At Will: Light, Thaumaturgy.

actions.name: Divine Aid (1/Day) (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The priest casts Bless, Healing Word, or Sanctuary, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two attacks, using Mace or Radiant Flame in any combination.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft., Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Bludgeoning damage plus 5 (2d4) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Flame
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +5, range 60 ft., Hit: 11 (2d10) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The priest casts one of the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13): At Will: Light, Thaumaturgy, 1/Day: Spirit Guardians.

actions.name: Divine Aid (2/Day) (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The priest casts Bless, Dispel Magic, Healing Word, or Lesser Restoration, using the same spellcasting ability as Spellcasting.

actions.name: Magic Resistance (Trait)
actions.desc: The pseudodragon has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The pseudodragon makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft., Hit: 4 (1d4 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the pseudodragon can see within 5 feet, Failure: 5 (2d4) Poison damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour, Failure by 5 or more: While Poisoned, the target also has the Unconscious condition, which ends early if the target takes damage or a creature within 5 feet of it takes an action to wake it.

actions.name: Tunneler (Trait)
actions.desc: The worm can burrow through solid rock at half its Burrow speed and leaves a 10-foot-diameter tunnel in its wake.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The worm makes one Bite attack and one Tail Stinger attack.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach 10 ft., Hit: 22 (3d8 + 9) Piercing damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 19), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Tail Stinger
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach 10 ft., Hit: 19 (3d6 + 9) Piercing damage plus 35 (10d6) Poison damage.

actions.name: Swallow (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 19, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the worm (it can have up to three creatures swallowed at a time), Failure: The target is swallowed by the worm, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 17 (5d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns. If the worm takes 30 damage or more on one turn from a creature inside it, the worm must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 5 feet of the worm and has the Prone condition. If the worm dies, any swallowed creatures no longer have the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

actions.name: Magic Resistance (Trait)
actions.desc: The quasit has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft., Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the start of the quasit's next turn.

actions.name: Invisibility
actions.desc: The quasit casts Invisibility on itself, requiring no spell components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Scare (1/Day)
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature within 30 feet, Failure: The target has the Frightened condition. At the end of each of its turns, the target repeats the save, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically.

actions.name: Shapechange
actions.desc: The quasit shape-shifts to resemble a bat (speed 10 ft., fly 40 ft.), a centipede (20 ft., climb 40 ft.), or a toad (40 ft., swim 40 ft.), or it returns to its true form. Its game statistics are the same in each form, except for its Speed. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed.

actions.name: Vulnerabilities (Trait)
actions.desc: Piercing damage from weapons wielded by creatures under the effect of a Bless spell.

actions.name: Magic Resistance (Trait)
actions.desc: The rakshasa has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The rakshasa makes two attacks, using its claws or its spellcasting ability.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft., Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The rakshasa casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 18): At Will: Detect Thoughts, Disguise Self, 3/Day Each: Charm Person, Detect Magic, Invisibility, Major Image, Suggestion, 1/Day Each: Dominate Person, Fly, Plane Shift, True Seeing.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes two Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.desc: The dragon makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +10, reach 10 ft. Hit: 13 (2d6 + 6) Slashing damage plus 3 (1d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 13, each creature in a 30-foot Cone. Failure: 56 (7d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Scorching Ray.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +14, reach 10 ft. Hit: 18 (1d10 + 8) Slashing damage plus 5 (2d4) Fire damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The dragon makes three Rend attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Spellcasting to cast Scorching Ray (level 3 version).

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +17, reach 15 ft. Hit: 19 (2d8 + 10) Slashing damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage.

actions.name: Fire Breath (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 24, each creature in a 90-foot Cone. Failure: 91 (26d6) Fire damage. Success: Half damage.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +11, reach 10 ft. Hit: 18 (2d10 + 7) Piercing damage plus 14 (4d6) Fire damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 17), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Swallow (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 19, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the remorhaz. It can move up to two creatures swallowed at a time. Failure: The target is swallowed by the remorhaz, and the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, it has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the remorhaz, and it takes 10 (3d6) Acid damage plus 10 (3d6) Fire damage at the start of each of the remorhaz’s turns. If the remorhaz takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the remorhaz must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which falls in a space within 5 feet of the remorhaz and has the Prone condition. If the remorhaz dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roc makes two Beak attacks. It can replace one attack with a Talons attack.

actions.name: Beak
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 10 ft. Hit: 28 (3d12 + 9) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Talons
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +13, reach 5 ft. Hit: 23 (4d6 + 9) Slashing damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 19) from both talons, and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Swoop (Recharge 5–6) (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: If the roc flies up to half its Fly speed without provoking Opportunity Attacks and drops that creature.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The roper makes two Tentacle attacks, uses Reel, and makes two Bite attacks.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 17 (3d8 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Tentacles
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 60 ft. Hit: The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14) from one of six tentacles, and the target has the Poisoned condition until the grapple ends. The tentacle can be damaged, freeing a creature it has Grappled when destroyed (AC 20, HP 10, Immunity to Poison and Psychic damage). Damaging the tentacle deals no damage to the roper, and a destroyed tentacle regrows at the start of the roper’s next turn.

actions.name: Reel
actions.desc: The roper pulls each creature Grappled by it up to 30 feet straight toward it.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The rust monster makes one Bite attack and uses Antennae twice.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Antennae
actions.desc: The rust monster touches one object made of iron or steel. If the object is not being worn or carried, it is destroyed. If the object is being worn or carried, the creature must succeed on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw or the object is destroyed. Magic items made of iron or steel are unaffected.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sahuagin makes two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +3, reach 5 ft. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Aquatic Charge (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The sahuagin swims up to its Swim Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The salamander makes two Flame Spear attacks. It can replace one attack with a use of Constrict.

actions.name: Flame Spear
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. or range 60/60 ft. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) Piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage. Hit or Miss: The spear magically returns to the salamander's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Constrict
actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 15, one Large or smaller creature the salamander can see within 10 feet. Failure: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Fire damage. The target has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14), and it has the Restrained condition until the grapple ends.

actions.name: Hooves
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the satyr pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Mockery
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 12, one creature the satyr can see within 90 feet. Failure: 5 (1d6 + 2) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Claw

actions.name: Death Glare (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 11, one Frightened creature the hag can see within 30 feet. Failure: The target has 20 Hit Points or fewer, it drops to 0 hit points. Otherwise, the target takes 13 (3d8) Psychic damage.

actions.name: Shadow Stealth (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: While in Dim Light or Darkness, the shadow takes the Hide action.

actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 15, one Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet. Failure: The target is pulled into the shambling mound's space and has the Grappled condition (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the target has the Blinded and Restrained conditions, and it takes 10 (2d6) Lightning damage at the start of each of its turns. When the shambling mound moves, the Grappled target moves with it, costing it no extra movement. The shambling mound can have only one creature Grappled by this action at a time.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) Bludgeoning damage plus 7 (2d6) Force damage.

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft, Hit: 9 (1d10 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The dragon casts one of the following spells, requiring all material components and using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 23, +15 to hit with spell attacks): At Will: Detect Magic, Hold Monster, Ice Knife (level 2 version), Shapechange (Beast or Humanoid form only, no Temporary Hit Points gained from the spell, and no Concentration or Temporary Hit Points required to maintain the spell). 1/Day Each: Control Weather, Ice Storm (level 7 version), Teleport, Zone of Truth.

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft, Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Slam
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft, Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: While in sunlight, the specter has Disadvantage on ability checks and attack rolls.

actions.name: Trait: Magic Resistance
actions.desc: The sphinx has Advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Slashing damage plus 7 (2d6) Radiant damage.

actions.name: Reaction: Burst of Ingenuity (2/Day)
actions.desc: Trigger. The sphinx or another creature within 30 feet makes an ability check or a saving throw. Response. The sphinx adds 2 to the roll.

actions.name: Trait: Inscrutable
actions.desc: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

actions.name: Trait: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
actions.desc: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The sphinx makes three Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +8, reach 5 ft. Hit: 14 (3d6 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Mind-Rending Roar (Recharge 5–6)
actions.desc: Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 16, each enemy in a 300-foot Emanation originating from the sphinx. Failure: 35 (10d6) Psychic damage, and the target has the Incapacitated condition until the start of the sphinx’s next turn.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The sphinx casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 16): At Will: Detect Magic, Identify, Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Nondetection. 1/Day Each: Dispel Magic, Legend Lore, Locate Object, Plane Shift, Remove Curse, Tongues.

actions.name: Legendary Action: Arcane Proof
actions.desc: The sphinx can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Legendary Action: Weight of Years
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the sphinx can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target gains 1 Exhaustion level. While the target has any Exhaustion levels, it appears 3d10 years older. Failure or Success: The sphinx can’t take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Trait: Inscrutable
actions.desc: No magic can observe the sphinx remotely or detect its thoughts without its permission. Wisdom (Insight) checks made to ascertain its intentions or sincerity are made with Disadvantage.

actions.name: Trait: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
actions.desc: If the sphinx fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +12, reach 5 ft. Hit: 20 (4d6 + 6) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Roar (3/Day)
actions.desc: The sphinx emits a magical roar. When-ever it roars, the roar has a different effect, as detailed below (the sequence resets when it takes a long Rest): First Roar. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, each enemy in a 500-foot Emanation originating from the sphinx. Failure: The target has the Frightened condition for 1 minute. Second Roar. Wisdom Saving Throw: DC 20, each enemy in a 500-foot Emanation originating from the sphinx. Failure: The target has the Paralyzed condition, and it repeats the save at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. After 1 minute, it succeeds automatically. Third Roar. Constitution Saving Throw: DC 20, each enemy in a 500-foot Emanation originating from the sphinx. Failure: 44 (8d10) Thunder damage, and the target has the Prone condition. Success: Half damage only.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc: The sphinx casts one of the following spells, requiring no Material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 20): At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Thaumaturgy. 1/Day Each: Detect Magic, Dispel Magic, Greater Restoration, Heroes' Feast, Zone of Truth.

actions.desc: The sphinx can teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space it can see, and it makes one Claw attack.

actions.name: Legendary Action: Weight of Years
actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 16, one creature the sphinx can see within 120 feet. Failure: The target gains 1 Exhaustion level. While the target has any exhaustion levels, it appears 3d10 years older. Failure or success: The sphinx can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Trait: Fiendish Restoration
actions.desc: If it dies, the naga returns to life in 1d6 days and regains all its Hit Points. Only a Wish spell can prevent this trait from functioning.

actions.name: Necrotic Ray
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +6, range 60 ft. Hit: 21 (6d6) Necrotic damage.

actions.name: Needle Sword
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Enchanting Bow

actions.desc: Charisma Saving Throw: DC 10, one creature within 5 feet the sprite can see (Celestials, Fiends, and Undead automatically fail the save). Failure: The sprite knows the target's emotions and alignment.

actions.name: Bonus Action: Cunning Action

actions.name: Multiattack

Response: The giant reduces the damage it takes from the attack by 11 (1d10 + 6), and if that damage is reduced to 0, the giant can redirect some of the attack's force. Dexterity Saving Throw: DC 17, one creature the giant can see within 60 feet. Failure: 11 (1d10 + 6) Force damage.

actions.desc: Strength Saving Throw: DC 27, one Large or smaller creature Grappled by the tarrasque (it can have up to two creatures swallowed at a time). Failure: The target is swallowed, and has the Grappled condition ends. A swallowed creature has the Blinded and Restrained conditions and can't teleport. It has Total Cover against attacks and other effects outside the tarrasque, and it takes 56 (16d6) Acid damage at the start of each of the tarrasque's turns. If the tarrasque takes damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the tarrasque must succeed on a DC 20 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of which land in a space within 10 feet of the tarrasque and have the Prone condition. If the tarrasque dies, any swallowed creature no longer has the Restrained condition and can escape from the corpse using 20 feet of movement, exiting Prone.

actions.name: Legendary Actions
actions.desc: The tarrasque can take 3 legendary actions, choosing from the options below. Only one legendary action can be used at a time and only at the end of another creature's turn. The tarrasque regains all expended uses at the start of each of its turns. Options: Onslaught, World-Shaking Movement.

actions.name: Onslaught (Legendary Action)
actions.desc: The tarrasque moves up to half its Speed, and it makes one Claw or Tail attack.

actions.name: World-Shaking Movement (Legendary Action)
actions.desc: The tarrasque moves up to its Speed. At the end of this movement, the tarrasque creates an instantaneous shock wave in a 60-foot-rim radiation originating from itself. Creatures in that area lose Concentration and, if Medium or smaller, have the Prone condition. The tarrasque can't take this action again until the start of its next turn.

actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +4, reach 5 ft. Hit: 5 (1d6 + 2) Bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +3, range 100/400 ft. Hit: 6 (1d10 + 1) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The Tough Boss makes two attacks, using Warhammer or Heavy Crossbow in any combination.

actions.name: Warhammer
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) Bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the tough pushes the target up to 10 feet straight away from itself.

actions.name: Heavy Crossbow
actions.desc: Ranged Attack Roll: +4, range 100/400 ft. Hit: 13 (2d10 + 2) Piercing damage.

actions.name: Animate Trees (1/day)
actions.desc: The treant magically animates up to two trees it can see within 60 feet of itself. Each tree uses the Treant stat block, except it has Intelligence and Charisma scores of 1, it can't speak, and it lacks this action. The tree takes the turn immediately after the treant on the same initiative count, and it obeys the treant. A tree remains animate for 1 day or until it dies, the treant dies, or it is more than 120 feet from the treant. The tree then takes root if possible.

actions.name: Regeneration
actions.desc: The troll regains 10 Hit Points at the start of each of its turns. If the troll takes Acid or Fire damage, this trait doesn't function on the troll's next turn. The troll dies only if it starts its turn with 0 Hit Points and doesn't regenerate.

actions.name: Troll Spawn
actions.desc: The limb uncommonly has the same senses as a whole troll. If the limb isn't destroyed within 24 hours, roll 1d12. On a 12, the limb turns into a Troll. Otherwise, the limb withers away.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The troll makes three Rend attacks.

actions.name: Rend
actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +7, reach 5 ft. Hit: 9 (2d4 + 4) Slashing damage.

actions.name: Charge (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The troll moves up to half its Speed straight toward an enemy it can see.

actions.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)

At Will: Detect Evil and Good, Druidcraft
1/Day Each: Calm Emotions, Dispel Evil and Good, Entangle, Pass without Trace, Word of Recall

actions.desc: The unicorn targets itself or one creature it can see within 60 feet of itself. The target gains 10 (3d6) Temporary Hit Points, and its AC increases by 2 until the end of the unicorn's next turn.

actions.name: Vampiric Connection
actions.desc: While the familiar and its vampire master are on the same plane of existence, the vampire can communicate with the familiar telepathically, and the vampire can perceive through the familiar's senses.

actions.name: Multiattack

actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Attack Roll: +5, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 7 Necrotic damage. If the target is reduced to 0 Hit Points by this attack, the target becomes stable but has the Poisoned condition for 1 hour. While it has the Poisoned condition, the target has the Paralyzed condition.

actions.name: Deathless Agility (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The familiar takes the Dash or Disengage action.

actions.name: Spider Climb
actions.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

actions.name: Vampire Weakness
actions.desc:
The vampire has these weaknesses:
Forbiddance: The vampire can't enter a residence without an invitation from an occupant.
Running Water: The vampire takes 20 Acid damage if it ends its turn in running water.
Stake to the Heart: The vampire is destroyed if a weapon that deals Piercing damage is driven into the vampire's heart while the vampire has the Incapacitated condition.
Sunlight: The vampire takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.

actions.desc: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and uses Bite.

actions.desc: Melee Attack Roll: +6, reach 5 ft. Hit: 8 (2d4 + 3) Slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the Grappled condition (escape DC 13) from one of two claws.

actions.desc: Constitution Saving Throw: DC 14, one creature within 5 feet that is willing or that has the Grappled, Incapacitated, or Restrained condition. Failure: 7 (1d4 + 3) Piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) Necrotic damage. The target's Hit Point maximum decreases by an amount equal to the Necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains Hit Points equal to that amount.

actions.name: Deathless Agility (Bonus Action)
actions.desc: The vampire takes the Dash or Disengage action.

actions.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day, or 4/Day in Lair)
actions.desc: If the vampire fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

actions.desc: If the vampire drops to 0 Hit Points outside its resting place, the vampire uses Shape-Shift to become mist (no action required). If it can't use Shape-Shift, it is destroyed. While it has 0 Hit Points in mist form, it can't return to its vampire form, and it must reach its resting place within 2 hours or be destroyed. Once in its resting place, it returns to its vampire form and has the Paralyzed condition until it regains any Hit Points and it regains 1 Hit Point after spending 1 hour there.

actions.name: Spider Climb
actions.desc: The vampire can climb difficult surfaces, including along ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

Sunlight: The vampire takes 20 Radiant damage if it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has Disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
